sentences.en: A DNA test showed that he was not the baby’s father. DNA
sentences.cn: 检测显示，他并非婴儿的父亲。

sentences.en: Andy Canvin is a pioneer on the strange frontier of DNA genealogy.
sentences.cn: 安迪-卡文是DNA谱系学奇异前沿的先锋人物.

sentences.en: At the moment, the regulation on how much human DNA can be put into an animal is vague.
sentences.cn: 目前，有关多少人类脱氧核糖核酸可以放入一只动物身上的规定，还很模糊。

sentences.en: DNA fingerprinting has proved the clincher in this investigation.
sentences.cn: 在这次调查中，DNA指纹鉴定起了决定性的作用。

sentences.en: DNA is the genetic material inside every cell that carries the blueprints for everything from hair color to the risk of cancer.
sentences.cn: 脱氧核糖核酸是存在于每个细胞内的基因物质，它承载从头发颜色到致癌风险等各种遗传型板。

sentences.en: DNA profiling has aided the struggle against crime.
sentences.cn: DNA分析对于打击犯罪有所帮助。

sentences.en: Geminiviruses are the only other group of plant DNA viruses known.
sentences.cn: 双联病毒是已知的唯一另一组植物DNA病毒.

sentences.en: Gene mutations are alterations in the DNA code.
sentences.cn: 基因突变是指DNA密码的改变.

sentences.en: Genetic abnormalities are more often associated with faults in paternal DNA than in maternal DNA.
sentences.cn: 相对于母本DNA，基因畸变往往更多地与父本DNA上的缺陷相关。

sentences.en: In early tests , DNA - based vaccines triggered both responses.
sentences.cn: 早期检测期间, DNA疫苗能激起双重反应.

sentences.en: Microbodies might possess their own DNA and have some degree of autonomy.
sentences.cn: 微体可能有其自身的DNA并有一定程度的自主性.
蛋白质和脱氧核糖核酸都是聚合体.

sentences.en: Ribose and deoxyribose are constituents of the nucleic acids RNA and DNA.
sentences.cn: 核糖与脱氧核糖分别是核糖核酸与脱氧核酸(DNA)的结构成分.

sentences.en: So, just before Thanksgiving, Carvin set off on a DNA - induced family reunion.
sentences.cn: 为此, 在感恩节前, 卡文奔赴由DNA推出的家族聚会.

sentences.en: The DNA of chromatin must replicate before cell division.
sentences.cn: 染色质DNA在细胞分裂之前必须复制.

sentences.en: They act at least a temporary block to DNA synthesis in micro - organisms.
sentences.cn: 它们在微生物中至少对DNA合成起暂时性的阻止作用.

sentences.en: They act at least a temporary block to DNA synthesis in microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 它们在微生物中至少对DNA合成起暂时性的阻止作用。

phrases.tran_cn: DNA指纹；DNA指纹图谱（等于genetic fingerprint）
DNA聚合酶；脱氧核糖核酸聚合酶
DNA复制；去氧核醣核酸的复制
abbr. 重组基因（recombinant deoxyribonucleic acid）

trans.tran_cn: 脱氧核糖核酸(deoxyribonucleic acid)，（美国）国防部核子局(Defense Nuclear Agency)

trans.tran_en: a substance that carries  genetic  information in the cells of the body
